name: ANH International
goal:
Alliance for Natural Health is an internationally-active, non-governmental organisation promoting natural and sustainable approaches to healthcare worldwide.

ANH-Intl campaigns across a wide range of fields, including the freedom of choice in healthcare, healthy eating & lifestyles, and the use of micronutrients and herbal products in the management of our health and resilience. We accomplish our mission through a unique application of 'good science' and 'good law'.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives:
EC Directive 2002/46/EC relating to food supplements
Regulation (EC) No 1925/2006 on the addition of vitamins and minerals and of certain other substances to foods
